summary: 检测Oracle E-Business Suite中的lcmServiceController.jsp文件是否存在SSRF漏洞（CVE-2018-3167），攻击者可能利用该漏洞未授权访问内网资源。
summary_en: Detects whether the lcmServiceController.jsp file in Oracle E-Business Suite has an SSRF vulnerability (CVE-2018-3167), which could allow attackers to access internal network resources without authorization.
